scripts.build: rm -rf public && PATH_PREFIX='/design/research' gatsby build --prefix-paths && mv public research && mkdir design && mv research design && mkdir public && mv design public
scripts.deploy:staging: yarn build && cf login -a https://api.ng.bluemix.net -o IBMDesignOrg -s research -sso && cf push ibm-design-research-staging -f manifest-staging.yml && cf login -a https://api.eu-de.bluemix.net -o IBMDesignOrg -s research -sso && cf push ibm-design-research-staging -f manifest-staging.yml
